title: Expedition to Earth
description: Ballantine Del Rey paperback, stated sixteenth printing, 1978. This is the first collection of short stories by Arthur C. Clarke, first published in 1953. Second Dawn (1951); "If I Forget Thee, Oh Earth . . ." (1951); Breaking Strain (1949); History Lesson (1949); Superiority (1951); Exile of the Eons (1950); Hide and Seek (1949); Expedition to Earth (1953); Loophole (1946); Inheritance (1947); The Sentinel (1951).
author: Arthur C. Clarke
